page.title: 20THE FONABY SACK cont.
page.content: first human victim - a mason working on a monument. The farmer said that one morning the mason came across the field to chip off a piece of the stone sack for a souvenir because he would be going away after finishing the building of Pelham's Pillar. He came in the morning, took his memento and went back to put the pinnacle on the tower which was to be finished. Suddenly he fell from the top and killed himself. Incidently or ironically, the dictionary definition of memento is ' reminder that death must come '. A few years ago a man from the local frozen food factory came and took a piece off and he was injured that same day when they were moving the viners.Later that day he was injured in a road traffic accident!
